mods.note: Gift of Eric Elam (Director of Operations, Greater Memphis Chamber)
mods.abstract: Program and materials from the January 1969 Annual Meeting of the Memphis Chamber of Commerce, featuring a celebration of Commercial Appeal editor Frank Ahlgren.

Users are solely responsible for determining the existence of such instances and for obtaining any other permissions and paying associated fees that may be necessary for the intended use. For all requests, please contact the History Department at 901.415.2742 or hisref@memphistn.gov.

relatedItem.abstract: Formed in 1838, the Memphis Chamber of Commerce has played an integral role in the direction of the city’s development. Beyond just supporting local industry and commerce, the Chamber has influenced decisions in numerous arenas – education, transportation, recreation, etc. A rather expansive view can be captured when we glimpse the city’s history through the lens of the Chamber. These digital files, spanning the entirety of the organization's history, were donated by the Chamber’s Director of Operations, Eric Elam, to honor the organization’s 175th anniversary in 2013. The originals remain with the Greater Memphis Chamber (www.memphischamber.com).
